definition: (has been) replaced with/(its) place has been taken by
to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon
to use/by means of/according to/in order to/because of/at (a certain date or place)
abbr. for Israel 以色列[Yi3 se4 lie4]

sentences.english: People would be wise to abandon rash inclinations and instead try in earnest.
sentences.chinese: 人们摒弃急燥冒进并代之以严肃认识是明智之举。

sentences.english: Instead of taking a bag of crisps for lunch, switch it for an apple. Get creative!
sentences.chinese: 不用酥脆的饼干作为午餐，代之以一个苹果。

sentences.english: Conventional vent lines are removed and replaced with a vent loop of high strength polymer textile braids.
sentences.chinese: 该项技术去掉顶孔绳，代之以高强编织带孔口圈。

sentences.english: That day, I quit drinking soft drink , and replaced it with water.
sentences.chinese: 那天，我戒酒软饮料，而代之以水。

sentences.english: The aim of science is to falsify theories and to replace them by better theories.
sentences.chinese: 科学的目标在否定理论，并代之以更好的理论。

sentences.english: The Communist shoutings are not dhave, or gaudy advertising up.
sentences.chinese: 党的标语被换了下来，代之以俗气的宣传。

sentences.english: Walking around instead of standing in one spot will reduce the risk of varicose veins.
sentences.chinese: 四处走动代之以站在同一处会减少静脉疾病的危险。

sentences.english: He argued that it would be best to abandon the concept of element altogether for a corpuscular philosophy.
sentences.chinese: 他认为最好完全取消元素这个概念而代之以微粒哲学。

sentences.english: The pointy roofs are being phased out and replaced by simple olive green facades.
sentences.chinese: 尖屋顶将逐渐取消，代之以简单的橄榄绿门面。

sentences.english: Cross-roads will not exist on these new highways, but will be replaced by bridges and flyovers.
sentences.chinese: 新公路上将没有十字路口，而代之以过街桥和立交桥。

sentences.english: They abolished the standing army, and instead armed the people.
sentences.chinese: 他们废除了常备军，代之以武装起来的人民。
